mapper.sql: manufacture_sn, order_id, technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date
mapper.insert:
insert into manufacture
manufacture_sn,
order_id,
technology_id,
launch_quantity,
begin_date,
end_date,
#{manufactureSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{launchQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update manufacture
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
technology_id = #{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
launch_quantity = #{launchQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where manufacture_sn = #{manufactureSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update manufacture set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, technology_id = #{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, launch_quantity = #{launchQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where manufacture_sn = #{manufactureSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select manufacture_sn, m.order_id, m.technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date, c.order_id as cid, t.technology_id as tid, t.technology_name from manufacture as m left join c_order as c on m.order_id = c.order_id left join technology as t on m.technology_id = t.technology_id limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select manufacture_sn, m.order_id, m.technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date, c.order_id as cid, t.technology_id as tid, t.technology_name from manufacture as m left join c_order as c on m.order_id = c.order_id left join technology as t on m.technology_id = t.technology_id where manufacture_sn like #{sn} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from manufacture where manufacture_sn like #{sn}

select manufacture_sn, m.order_id, m.technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date, c.order_id as cid, t.technology_id as tid, t.technology_name from manufacture as m left join c_order as c on m.order_id = c.order_id left join technology as t on m.technology_id = t.technology_id where m.order_id like #{orderId} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from manufacture where order_id like #{orderId}

select manufacture_sn, m.order_id, m.technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date, c.order_id as cid, t.technology_id as tid, t.technology_name from manufacture as m left join c_order as c on m.order_id = c.order_id left join technology as t on m.technology_id = t.technology_id where t.technology_name like #{tName} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select manufacture_sn, m.order_id, m.technology_id, launch_quantity, begin_date, end_date, c.order_id as cid, t.technology_id as tid, t.technology_name from manufacture as m left join c_order as c on m.order_id = c.order_id left join technology as t on m.technology_id = t.technology_id where manufacture_sn = #{sn}
